anya-e0105n18:1_1: buddhavasse sīhaḷadīpato sakkatabhāsāropitaṁ mahisāsakavinayapiṭakañca dīghāgamo ca saṁyuttāgamo ca sannipātapiṭakañca
anya-e0105n18:1_2: attanā saha cinaraṭṭhamānītanti tassa addhānakkamakathāyaṁ dassitaṁ.
anya-e0105n18:1_12: te pana dvepi piṭakāni uggaṇhanti mahāyānapiṭakañceva theravādapiṭakañcā”ti ca teneva cinabhikkhunā dassitaṁ.
anya-e0105n18:2_1: tasmā tasmiṁ vihāre mahāyānikānaṁ padhānācariyabhūtehi assaghosanāgajjunehi kataganthāpi saṁvijjamānāyeva bhaveyyuṁ,
anya-e0105n18:2_2: tatoyeva tesaṁ nayañca nāmañca ācariyabuddhaghosattheropi aññepi taṁkālikā mahāvihāravāsino sutasampannā therā jāneyyuṁyeva.
anya-e0105n18:2_3: Apica dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe samuddasamīpe guntājanapade nāgārajunakoṇḍaṁ nāma ṭhānamatthi,
anya-e0105n18:2_4: yattha nāgajjuno mahāyānikānaṁ padhānācariyabhūto vasanto buddhasāsanaṁ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0105n18:2_8: Tasmāpi ācariyabuddhaghosatthero nāgajjunassa ca assaghosassa ca nayañca nāmañca jāneyyayevāti sakkā anuminituṁ.
anya-e0105n18:3_0: Jānatoyeva pana tesaṁ nayassa vā nāmassa vā attano aṭṭhakathāyamappakāsanaṁ tesaṁ nikāyantarabhāvatoyevassa.
anya-e0105n18:3_2: buddhavassabbhantare) theravādato bhinnesu ekādasasu gaṇesu sabbatthivādagaṇe pariyāpanno,
anya-e0105n18:3_5: mahāvihāravāsino ca āditoyeva paṭṭhāya nikāyantarasamayehi asammissanatthaṁ attano piṭakaṁ atīva ādaraṁ katvā rakkhanti,
anya-e0105n18:3_8: Tasmā “ācariyabuddhaghoso tesaṁ nayaṁ jānantoyeva attano ganthesu nikāyantarasamayehi asammissanatthaṁ nappakāsesī”ti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0105n18:4_1: jāto brāhmaṇamāṇavo”tiādinā vuttassa mahāvaṁsavacanassa vicāraṇamukhena ācariyabuddhaghosassa vambhanavacanāni dhammānandakosambinā vuttāni,
anya-e0105n18:4_3: Tathāpi “ācariyabuddhaghoso bodhimaṇḍasamīpe jāto”ti etaṁ pana atthaṁ sādhetuṁ daḷhakāraṇaṁ na dissateva ṭhapetvā taṁ mahāvaṁsavacanaṁ,
anya-e0105n18:4_5: tampi mahāvaṁsameva nissāya vuttavacanattā na daḷhakāraṇaṁ hotīti.
